body: Rick Lowe of Weblog Bahamas responds to those who argue that "all economic activity" in the Bahamas should be "reserved exclusively for Bahamians" by pointing to a 2003 paper on foreign investment.
original_body: Rick Lowe of Weblog Bahamas responds to those who argue that "all economic activity" in the Bahamas should be "reserved exclusively for Bahamians" by pointing to a 2003 paper on foreign investment.
title: Bahamas: economic "Bahamianisation"?

sentence: Rick Lowe of Weblog Bahamas responds to those who argue that "all economic activity" in the Bahamas should be "reserved exclusively for Bahamians" by pointing to a 2003 paper on foreign investment.
